name: sharepoint-wikipage-upload
description: Uploads a wiki page to a SharePoint list using a ClientId and Secret.
author: Drew Killion

inputs.name: url
inputs.label: Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: A path to a folder or file

inputs.name: listId
inputs.label: List Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: GUID id of the SharePoint list

inputs.name: imgPath
inputs.label: Image Folder Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Document library path for storing images. Must exist on the same SharePoint site as the wiki library

inputs.name: script
inputs.label: Script File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to a single Html file that contains all the scripts and css content.

inputs.name: sourceFolder
inputs.label: Source Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source folder that the copy pattern(s) will be run from.  Empty is the root of the repo.  Use [variables](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=550988) if files are not in the repo. Example: $(agent.builddirectory)

inputs.name: contents
inputs.label: Contents
inputs.helpMarkDown: File paths to include as part of the copy. Supports multiple lines of match patterns. [More Information](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=708389)
